data.why:
I'm currently working on pure perl implementation of an excel 2003
    XML Writer. As I didn't find something like that on CPAN, I would
    love to add this once it is finished...

    I also started working on a pure perl, web based linux/windows
    monitoring system incl. some administrative functions. Nothing new
    at all, but as it is supposed to support skins, ssl and long term
    monitoring (graphics/charts), it is probably another useful
    monitor...

    Cheers, michael
